column4: Ubuntu includes the very best in translations? hah, your web browser doesn't even speak my language ;-)
Install totem-xine. Then add "deb ftp://ftp.nerim.net/debian-marillat/ unstable main" to sources.list. Then install libdvdcss2 (totally unsupported, maybe illegal etc).
the update looks like it installed sucessfully, but it still says package totem-xine has no installation candidate
and you removed the #s from the line with universe?
i removed the whole line
was i only supposed to remove the # signs?
like removed the whole line
the whole link
yes, then add " universe" at the end of the "... warty main restricted" line
alright i did the update, it said a few files failed to update but were being ignore or replaced
that's not so good (as in "that's no improvement")
oh
well what could that be from?
Failed to fetch http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/warty-security/universe/binary-i386/Packages.gz  404 Not Found
thats the error
ah, you added universe in the warty-security line as well?
all of them
space then universe
should there be no space?
dunno
no, it's okay. I wasn't clear enough. You can remove universe from the warty-security lines to get rid of the errors. But it should work with them. Can you install totem-xine now?
